研究强调了眼基因治疗反应的性别和年龄差异新研究发现，老年妇女可能容易受到新基因疗法的有害炎症，以治疗无法治愈的眼部疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/research-highlights-gender-and-age-differences-in-eye-gene-gene-therapy-therapy-responses.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/research-highlights-gender-and-age-differences-in-eye-gene-gene-therapy-therapy-responses.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7664E6C4-B3DD-4933-8201-15C9CA602FE1 Mon, 10 Feb 2025 09:12:13 -0500 Research highlights gender and age differences in eye gene therapy responses
基于MSC的新型疗法为眼部GVHD治疗提供了希望移植物抗宿主病（GVHD）是干细胞移植后发生的常见且严重的并发症，其中供体的免疫细胞攻击受体的组织。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/Novel-MSC-based-therapy-provides-hope-for-ocular-GVHD-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/Novel-MSC-based-therapy-provides-hope-for-ocular-GVHD-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3A49E0EE-3289-4D05-82B5-F13E31AED281 Mon, 10 Feb 2025 08:57:19 -0500 Novel MSC-based therapy provides hope for ocular GVHD treatment
疼痛可能导致癌症幸存者中的香烟和大麻使用增加根据Wiley Online在《美国癌症协会的同行评审》杂志上发表的一项研究，经历疼痛可能会增加癌症幸存者使用香烟和大麻的几率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/pain-may-lead-to-to-increast-cigarette-cigarette-and-cannabis-use-in-cancer-in-cancer-survivors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/pain-may-lead-to-to-increast-cigarette-cigarette-and-cannabis-use-in-cancer-in-cancer-survivors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=AA7BD507-C75B-40FB-B3C2-3C2-3DB6388AAEE7 Mon, 10 Feb 2025 08:12:00 -0500 Pain may lead to increased cigarette and cannabis use in cancer survivors

新模型揭示了在决策过程中如何处理感官提示一个新的数学模型阐明了决策过程中大脑如何处理不同的线索，例如视觉和声音。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/new-model-reveals-how-the-the-the-brain-processes-sensory-cues-dering-decision-making.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/new-model-reveals-how-the-the-the-brain-processes-sensory-cues-defing-decision-making.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e48a3620-80f1-490e-A131-E6718CD319B3 Mon, 10 Feb 2025 07:57:27 -0500 New model reveals how the brain processes sensory cues during decision making
现场输血挽救生命。但是救护车很少能够做到。 2023年8月的一个下午，安吉拉·马丁（Angela Martin）的堂兄呼唤令人震惊的消息。马丁的74岁姑姑在她位于北卡罗来纳州乡村乡村的家附近散步时，被四只狗畏缩。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/blood-transfusions-at-the-scene-scene-save-lives-but-ambulances-are-are-rarely-pecial-rarely-配备to-to-to-them.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/blood-transfusions-at-the-scene-scene-save-lives-but-ambulances-are-are-rarely-pecimple-do-to-them.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=10A83445-CB89-4BF1-BF1-BFDF-1D524B2FB4E6 Mon, 10 Feb 2025 07:30:22 -0500 Blood transfusions at the scene save lives. But ambulances are rarely equipped to do them.
猫流感的猫猫可能会对公共卫生构成风险自2022年以来，已经确认有80多只家猫，包括许多其他类型的哺乳动物 - 通常生活在奶牛场上的谷仓猫，以及野猫和宠物，它们在户外度过时光，并可能通过狩猎而抓住它。患病的啮齿动物或野鸟。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/house-cats-with-bird-flu-flu-could-could-pose-a-risk-to-public-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/house-cats-with-bird-flu-flu-could-pose-a-a--------------------------------aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3bc3f51c-dc51-4b1d-8a70-8a0-8A0ED91DFDE7 Mon, 10 Feb 2025 07:28:41 -0500 House cats with bird flu could pose a risk to public health
研究揭示了创伤经历与子宫内膜异位症风险之间的联系该研究发现创伤与子宫内膜异位症之间存在联系，这表明解决心理因素可以改善诊断和治疗结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/study-reveals-link-between--traumatic-ecperiences--ecperiences-and-endomortionsis-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/study-reveals-link-between--traumatic-traumatic-ecperiences-and-endomertionsis-risk-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=153532CA-C57B-4968-9833-8ECD5A0CB160 Mon, 10 Feb 2025 04:26:00 -0500 Study reveals link between traumatic experiences and endometriosis risk
食品包装中的微塑料可能会增加心脏病风险微型塑料对心脏健康构成威胁，导致血管细胞的有害变化，并增加患有动脉粥样硬化等心血管疾病的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/microplastics-in-food-packaging-may-increase-may-increase-nert-disease-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/microplastics-in-food-packaging-may-increase-may-increase-nert-disease-risk-aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4f9c3d38-be63-4830-830-8f48-946ebee03199 Mon, 10 Feb 2025 03:43:00 -0500 Microplastics in food packaging may increase heart disease risk
研究表明，避孕药可以帮助降低卵巢癌的风险。 UNISA研究人员使用人工智能筛查卵巢癌的危险因素，发现口服避孕药将卵巢癌的风险降低了曾经使用过该药丸的妇女的26％，而在使用该药丸后使用该药丸的妇女则降低了43％年龄45岁。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/contraceptive-pill-could-help-reduce-risk-risk-ovarian-cancer-cancer-cancer-cancer-suggests.aspxs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250210/contraceptive-pill-could-help-reduce-help-reduce-risk-ovarian-cancer-cancer-cancer-study-suggests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=95fd32d55-d091-4760-A955-4B835BEFF556 Mon, 10 Feb 2025 01:18:00 -0500 Contraceptive pill could help reduce risk of ovarian cancer, study suggests
